text: Opalkovo () is a small settlement west of Velike Lašče in central Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Velike Lašče is included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region and was part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola.Velike Lašče municipal site ==Name== The name Opalkovo is derived from the verb opaliti 'to singe, burn off', referring to land that was cleared for settlement. ==References== ==External links== *Opalkovo on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Opalkovo
